author: adityapatwardhan
body:
## Steps to reproduce

BVT/DRT tests for Remoting/NamesPipeTransport.
## Expected behavior

Tests pass.
## Actual behavior

Tests fail, without any error in logs. Need better failure logging.
## Environment data

``` powershell
> $PSVersionTable
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      5.1.10032.0
PSEdition                      Desktop
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
BuildVersion                   3.0.0.0
GitCommitId                    v0.6.0-112-g3276846c401e0c2132cc260f89752b121c81abde
CLRVersion                     4.0.30319.42000
WSManStackVersion              3.0
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
```

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: @PaulHigin Do we have any NamedPipe tests for PSv6? Can this be closed?

comments.author: PaulHigin
comments.body: Not that I am aware of.  I believe these tests still need to be ported.

title: Port NamedPipes tests from BVT/DRTs
